scripts.typecheck: pnpm --filter !web recursive exec tsc --noEmit && pnpm -F web check
scripts.validate: pnpm run lint:fix && pnpm run typecheck && pnpm run test && pnpm run test:db
scripts.validate!: pnpm run lint:fix && pnpm run typecheck && pnpm run test
scripts.db:up: pnpm dc:up && sleep 2 && pnpm mig:up && pnpm towns
scripts.mig:new: pnpm --filter core exec drizzle-kit generate --config src/db/drizzle.config.ts
scripts.mig:up: pnpm --filter core exec drizzle-kit migrate --config src/db/drizzle.config.ts
scripts.mig:push: pnpm --filter core exec drizzle-kit push --config src/db/drizzle.config.ts
